content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Used for converting iron ore and coal into iron plates.
Consists of:
– Furnace used for the smelting process

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0)
Used for converting copper ore and coal into copper plates.
Consists of:
– Furnace integrated in copper smelting operations

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities API Misuse:
  – Use the correct function signature. Avoid passing unsupported keywords (e.g. “radius”) or extra positional arguments.
  
• Lab Placement and Inventory:
  – Before attempting to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), verify that a Lab item is present in the inventory to avoid placement errors.
  
• Safe Entity Iteration:
  – Ensure the return value from get_entities is not None before iterating over it to prevent “NoneType” errors.
  
• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages:
  – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron‑gear‑wheel and electronic‑circuit) are sufficiently available before initiating Lab crafting.
  – Double‑check production chains so that precursor items (iron plates, copper plates for copper cables, etc.) can be crafted with existing machinery.
  
• Insufficient Ingredient Errors:
  – Address recurring shortages (e.g. missing iron‑gear‑wheels) by boosting production and reviewing recipe requirements prior to lab crafting attempts.
